Alexandra Palace (Dance Hall), Alexandra Park, Haringey, Greater London, England, UK Programme lists adjudicator "G. Ward (Newcastle)", but this seems an obvious misprint for "C. Ward" given that the 1936 programme had the latter with an identical location annotated, British Bandsman 2/10/1937 shows Charles Ward.
